name: Keg Golem
description: A medium-sized golem made of wood and metal, resembling a large keg, with a solid physical presence that is filled with ale.
memorable: Its reliance on ale for combat effectiveness adds an interesting tactical element to its abilities.
goals: To serve its creator and engage in battle effectively while maintaining its ale supplies.
relations: Related to other golems, particularly those that serve functions in a tavern or similar environments.
environment: Typically found in some form of artisan workshops or places where ale is brewed.
strengths: Strong physical attributes, immunity to many conditions, and advantageous against magic attacks.
weaknesses: Dependence on ale for optimal performance and low Dexterity affecting agility.
attacks: Slam attack that delivers solid bludgeoning damage and an Ale Blast that can poison enemies.
most_powerful_ability: The Ale Blast, which can deal poison damage in a cone and inflict poison condition.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing limited awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Immune to poison and psychic damage.
Condition immunity to charmed, frightened, and similar effects.
Empty Keg ability affects combat effectiveness when out of ale.
Magic Resistance gives an edge against spellcasters.
test_queries: battlefield golem that can poison foes
medium golem with special ale abilities
golem immune to poison and psychic damage
